head.title: User of the Week: Harsha Alva

body: This Week’s User of the Week: @harsha.alva Harsha Alva. This 22 Year Old #Engineer has dominated the Collaborizm ranks and brought great life to our maker/entrepreneurial community. Check out his NodeBot and other contributions on the platform and be amazed. Thank you Harsha for your hard work and guidance! #make #collaborizm #collaborate #drones #makersmovement #makeordie #Innovator #nodejs #india #incubate #universe #earth #connectivity #build #art #science #math #mongodb #raspberrypi3
